PKGMAN-LIST-NODEPENDENTS(1) General Commands Manual PKGMAN-LIST-NODEPENDENTS(1)

NAME

pkgman-list-nodependents — print list of packages that no other depends on them

SYNOPSIS

pkgman list-nodependents [-v | -vv] [--path]

DESCRIPTION

Print list of packages without dependents. “Nodependent” are packages without packages depending on them.

The options are as follows:

-v
Show package version in the listing.
-vv
Show package version and description in the listing.
--path
Show package source path in the listing.
September 9, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
